verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are they that came<WH935> to David<WH1732> to Ziklag,<WH6860> while he yet<WH5750> kept<WH6113> himself close<WH6113> because<WH6440> of Saul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of Kish:<WH7027> and they were among the mighty<WH1368> men, helpers<WH5826> of the war.<WH4421>

They were armed<WH5401> with bows,<WH7198> and could use<WH3231> both the right<WH3231> hand<WH3231> and the left<WH8041> in hurling stones<WH68> and shooting arrows<WH2671> out of a bow,<WH7198> even of Saul's<WH7586> brothers<WH251> of Benjamin.<WH1144>

The chief<WH7218> was Ahiezer,<WH295> then Joash,<WH3101> the sons<WH1121> of Shemaah<WH8094> the Gibeathite;<WH1395> and Jeziel,<WH3149> and Pelet,<WH6404> the sons<WH1121> of Azmaveth;<WH5820> and Berachah,<WH1294> and Jehu<WH3058> the Antothite.<WH6069>

And Ismaiah<WH3460> the Gibeonite,<WH1393> a mighty<WH1368> man among the thirty,<WH7970> and over<WH5921> the thirty;<WH7970> and Jeremiah,<WH3414> and Jahaziel,<WH3166> and Johanan,<WH3110> and Josabad<WH3107> the Gederathite,<WH1452>
Eluzai,<WH498> and Jerimoth,<WH3406> and Bealiah,<WH1183> and Shemariah,<WH8114> and Shephatiah<WH8203> the Haruphite,<WH2741>
Elkanah,<WH511> and Jesiah,<WH3449> and Azareel,<WH5832> and Joezer,<WH3134> and Jashobeam,<WH3434> the Korhites,<WH7145>
And Joelah,<WH3132> and Zebadiah,<WH2069> the sons<WH1121> of Jeroham<WH3395> of Gedor.<WH1446>

And of the Gadites<WH1425> there separated<WH914> themselves to David<WH1732> into the hold<WH4679> to the wilderness<WH4057> men<WH582> of might,<WH2428> and men of war<WH6635> fit for the battle,<WH4421> that could handle<WH6186> shield<WH6793> and buckler,<WH7420> whose faces<WH6440> were like the faces<WH6440> of lions,<WH738> and were as swift<WH4116> as the roes<WH6643> on the mountains;<WH2022>
Ezer<WH5829> the first,<WH7218> Obadiah<WH5662> the second,<WH8145> Eliab<WH446> the third,<WH7992>
Mishmannah<WH4925> the fourth,<WH7243> Jeremiah<WH3414> the fifth,<WH2549>
Attai<WH6262> the sixth,<WH8345> Eliel<WH447> the seventh,<WH7637>
Johanan<WH3110> the eighth,<WH8066> Elzabad<WH443> the ninth,<WH8671>
Jeremiah<WH3414> the tenth,<WH6224> Machbanai<WH4344> the eleventh.<WH6240>

These<WH428> were of the sons<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> captains<WH7218> of the host:<WH6635> one<WH259> of the least<WH6996> was over an hundred,<WH3967> and the greatest<WH1419> over a thousand.<WH505>

These<WH428> <WH1992> are they that went<WH5674> over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> in the first<WH7223> month,<WH2320> when it had overflowed<WH4390> all<WH3605> his banks;<WH1428> and they put<WH7760> to flight<WH1272> all<WH3605> them of the valleys,<WH6010> both toward the east,<WH4217> and toward the west.<WH4628>
And there came<WH935> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> and Judah<WH3063> to the hold<WH4679> to David.<WH1732>

And David<WH1732> went<WH3318> out to meet<WH6440> them, and answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to them, If<WH518> you be come<WH935> peaceably<WH7965> to me to help<WH5826> me, my heart<WH3824> shall be knit<WH3162> to you: but if<WH518> you be come to betray<WH7411> me to my enemies,<WH6862> seeing there is no<WH3808> wrong<WH2555> in my hands,<WH3709> the God<WH430> of our fathers<WH1> look<WH7200> thereon, and rebuke<WH3198> it.

Then the spirit<WH7307> came<WH3847> on Amasai,<WH6022> who was chief<WH7218> of the captains,<WH7991> and he said, Your are we, David,<WH1732> and on your side, you son<WH1121> of Jesse:<WH3448> peace,<WH7965> peace<WH7965> be to you, and peace<WH7965> be to your helpers;<WH5826> for your God<WH430> helps<WH5826> you. Then David<WH1732> received<WH6901> them, and made<WH5414> them captains<WH7218> of the band.<WH1416>

And there fell<WH5307> some of Manasseh<WH4519> to David,<WH1732> when he came<WH935> with the Philistines<WH6430> against<WH5921> Saul<WH7586> to battle:<WH4421> but they helped<WH5826> them not: for the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> on advisement<WH6098> sent<WH7971> him away, saying,<WH559> He will fall<WH5307> to his master<WH113> Saul<WH7586> to the jeopardy of our heads.<WH7218>

As he went<WH3212> to Ziklag,<WH6860> there fell<WH5307> to him of Manasseh,<WH4519> Adnah,<WH5734> and Jozabad,<WH3107> and Jediael,<WH3043> and Michael,<WH4317> and Jozabad,<WH3107> and Elihu,<WH453> and Zilthai,<WH6769> captains<WH7218> of the thousands<WH505> that were of Manasseh.<WH4519>
And they helped<WH5826> David<WH1732> against<WH5921> the band<WH1416> of the rovers: for they were all<WH3605> mighty<WH1368> men of valor,<WH2428> and were captains<WH8269> in the host.<WH6635>
For at that time<WH6256> day<WH3117> by day<WH3117> there came<WH935> to David<WH1732> to help<WH5826> him, until<WH5704> it was a great<WH1419> host,<WH4264> like the host<WH4264> of God.<WH430>

And these<WH428> are the numbers<WH4557> of the bands<WH7218> that were ready armed<WH2502> to the war,<WH6635> and came<WH935> to David<WH1732> to Hebron,<WH2275> to turn<WH5437> the kingdom<WH4438> of Saul<WH7586> to him, according to the word<WH6310> of the LORD.<WH3068>
The children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> that bore<WH5375> shield<WH6793> and spear<WH7420> were six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and eight<WH8083> hundred,<WH3967> ready armed<WH2502> to the war.<WH6635>
Of the children<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> mighty<WH1368> men of valor<WH2428> for the war,<WH6635> seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and one hundred.<WH3967>
Of the children<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967>
And Jehoiada<WH3111> was the leader<WH5057> of the Aaronites,<WH175> and with him were three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred;<WH3967>
And Zadok,<WH6659> a young<WH5288> man mighty<WH1368> of valor,<WH2428> and of his father's<WH1> house<WH1004> twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147> captains.<WH8269>

And of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> the kindred<WH251> of Saul,<WH7586> three<WH7969> thousand:<WH505> for till now<WH5704> <WH2008> the greatest<WH4768> part of them had kept<WH8104> the ward<WH4931> of the house<WH1004> of Saul.<WH7586>

And of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> and eight<WH8083> hundred,<WH3967> mighty<WH1368> men of valor,<WH2428> famous<WH8034> throughout the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>

And of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> eighteen<WH8083> <WH6240> thousand,<WH505> which<WH834> were expressed<WH5344> by name,<WH8034> to come<WH935> and make David<WH1732> king.<WH4427>

And of the children<WH1121> of Issachar,<WH3485> which were men that had understanding<WH998> of the times, to know<WH3045> what<WH4100> Israel<WH3478> ought to do;<WH6213> the heads<WH7218> of them were two hundred;<WH3967> and all<WH3605> their brothers<WH251> were at<WH5921> their commandment.<WH6310>

Of Zebulun,<WH2074> such as went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to battle,<WH6635> expert<WH6186> in war,<WH4421> with all<WH3605> instruments<WH3627> of war,<WH4421> fifty<WH2572> thousand,<WH505> which could keep<WH5737> rank:<WH5737> they were not of double heart.<WH3820>
And of Naphtali<WH5321> a thousand<WH505> captains,<WH8269> and with them with shield<WH6793> and spear<WH2595> thirty<WH7970> and seven<WH7651> thousand.<WH505>
And of the Danites<WH1839> expert<WH6186> in war<WH4421> twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967>
And of Asher,<WH836> such as went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to battle,<WH6635> expert<WH6186> in war,<WH4421> forty<WH705> thousand.<WH505>

And on the other<WH5676> side<WH5676> of Jordan,<WH3383> of the Reubenites,<WH7206> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> with all<WH3605> manner of instruments<WH3627> of war<WH6635> for the battle,<WH4421> an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> thousand.<WH505>

All<WH3605> these<WH428> men<WH582> of war,<WH4421> that could keep<WH5737> rank,<WH4634> came<WH935> with a perfect<WH8003> heart<WH3820> to Hebron,<WH2275> to make David<WH1732> king<WH4427> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> Israel:<WH3478> and all<WH3605> the rest<WH7611> also<WH1571> of Israel<WH3478> were of one<WH259> heart<WH3824> to make David<WH1732> king.<WH4427>
And there<WH8033> they were with David<WH1732> three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> eating<WH398> and drinking:<WH8354> for their brothers<WH251> had prepared<WH3559> for them.

Moreover<WH1571> they that were near<WH7126> them, even to Issachar<WH3485> and Zebulun<WH2074> and Naphtali,<WH5321> brought<WH935> bread<WH3899> on asses,<WH2543> and on camels,<WH1581> and on mules,<WH6505> and on oxen,<WH1241> and meat,<WH3978> meal,<WH7058> cakes<WH1690> of figs, and bunches<WH6778> of raisins,<WH6778> and wine,<WH3196> and oil,<WH8081> and oxen,<WH1241> and sheep<WH6629> abundantly:<WH7230> for there was joy<WH8057> in Israel.<WH3478>
